LanguageData.RoundHandFan.label: Round hand fan
LanguageData.RoundHandFan.description: A traditional Japanese cooling tool.\n Fans are indispensable items to overcome hot days.\nWhen one season is over, the fans will disappear.
LanguageData.RoundHandFan_Blueprint.label: Round hand fan (blueprint)
LanguageData.RoundHandFan_Blueprint_Install.label: Round hand fan (blueprint)
LanguageData.RoundHandFan_Frame.label: Round hand fan (building)
LanguageData.RoundHandFan_Frame.description: A traditional Japanese cooling tool.\n Fans are indispensable items to overcome hot days.\nWhen one season is over, the fans will disappear.
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier.label: Brazier
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier.description: Traditional Japanese heating equipment. It is also possible to cook the Mochi in the brazier.
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Blueprint.label: Brazier (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Blueprint_Install.label: Brazier (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Frame.label: Brazier (building)
LanguageData.ZP_Brazier_Frame.description: Traditional Japanese heating equipment. It is also possible to cook the Mochi in the brazier.
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu.label: 炬燵
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu.description: 日本の伝統的な暖房器具。机の上に布団を被せその中に熱源を置く事で暖かくする。
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu_Blueprint.label: 炬燵 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu_Blueprint_Install.label: 炬燵 (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu_Frame.label: 炬燵 (building)
LanguageData.ZP_Kotatu_Frame.description: 日本の伝統的な暖房器具。机の上に布団を被せその中に熱源を置く事で暖かくする。
